content: rnds 64 sts body of bag rnds 1 6 using c k rnds 7 13 using b k 3 version iii added 2 handled bags and corrected size of bowl bases rnds 14 19 using a k rnds 20 26 using b k rnds 27 28 using c k round 29 using c k1 ssk k to last 3 sts before marker k2tog sm 4x 56 sts round 30 using c p14 sm k14 sm 2x round 31 using c k round 32 using c repeat round 30 round 33 using c bobble 14 sts rm k13 rm 2x sides and handle of bag transfer14 sts just worked onto one dpn keep unused sts on circ needles or place on holders turn you are no longer working in rnds you will work in row row 1 using c p row 2 using c k1 ssk k to last 3 sts k2tog k1 12 sts row 3 using c p row 4 using c k1 ssk k to last 3 sts k2tog k1 10 sts row 5 using c p row 6 using c k1 ssk k to last 3 sts k2tog k1 8 sts row 7 16 using c work i-cord over 8 sts row 17 29 using a work i-cord over 8 sts or until you run out of a row 30 - 39 using c work i-cord over 8 sts row 40 using c p row 41 using c kfb k to last 3 sts kfb k1 10 sts row 42 using c p row 43 using c kfb k to last 3 sts kfb k1 12 sts row 44 using c p row 45 using c kfb k to last 3 sts kfb k1 14 sts row 46 using c p bobble place rs decrease 3 needle bobble in p weave in ends follow felting instructions on page 11 4 version iii added 2 handled bags and corrected size of bowl bases b slightly larger project bag with single handle 4 2 oz of worsted or bulky weight yarn or more hold two strands together throughout if using worsted weight yarn size after felting 5 5 tall 10 total including handle 5 wide at base yarn colors decide in advance the colors you will use for striping color a light color b variegated color c dark beg at base using color c and circular needle co 18 sts row 1 37 using c k row 38 using c pm pu & k18 sts directly to the left of live sts pm turn corner pu & k18 sts pm turn corner pu & k18 sts pcm to denote beg of round join to k in rnds 72 sts body of bag rnds 1 6 using c k rnds 7 13 using b k rnds 14 19 using a k rnds 20 26 using b k rnds 27 28 using c k round 29 using c k1 ssk k to last 3 sts before marker k2tog sm 4x 64
